snippet: Uber, a car service with a following among urbanites, is trying to expand its appeal to the less affluent by adding less luxurious cars.
abstract: San Francisco start-up Uber will add a cheaper hybrid car option to its successful car service app; hybrid cars will cost between 10 and 25 percent more than a regular taxi, as compared to the service's 40 to 100 percent premium for a town car.
lead_paragraph: Uber, a car service with a following among urbanites, is trying to expand its appeal to the less affluent by adding less luxurious cars.

headline.seo: Uber, an App That Summons a Car, Plans a Cheaper Service
headline.main: Uber, an App That Summons a Car, Plans a Cheaper Service Using Hybrids
headline.print_headline: Uber, an App That Summons a Car, Plans a Cheaper Service Using Hybrids
